channel.title: Setting up server on Mac OS?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need help setting up a server on Mac. I've tried all the tutorials and it hasn't worked... :L

item.title: Setting up server on Mac OS?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:2, topic:429180”]its almost impossible to run server on mac but i still did it so ill help you out

you need a snow transformation pack first search on google for it but only search for windows 7 version since
you using a mac OS that should help you run the server[/quote]

You don’t need that. Java comes preinstalled on every Apple computer (possibly ever device?). The way you run it on a Mac is exactly the same way you would run it in windows.

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up server on Mac OS?
